How it works

Focus On The Work You Love


Create a Single Source of Truth

Store all your inforamtion in one place. Save time updating and showing your organisation compliance information by keeping it in one place.

Save Heaps of Admin Time

Save over $720 of overhead time right away. Takahui's easy step-by-step guide will save you on average 36 hours of time submiting pre-assessment information to your Assessor. We only ask you the same question once, so next time next submission will save you even more.

Securely and Transparantly Share

Know your information is safe in transit and have visiblity over who your sharing your organisation's information with.

All your organisation information in one dashboard

Safely manage and maintain your organisations compliance in one place.

Know your requirments

Designed for Social Service Providers. Know what information is the most important to track share.

Have strong business continuity

Store your information safely for more than seven years. Access your important documents securely from the cloud.

Help

Need help? Don't hesitate to ask us something. Send a message or email us direcltly at hello@accreditron.com. We have designed Takahui by working with Social Service Providers, hearing from you is the best way to help the Takahui best serve the social sector.
